unit.title: BAR SERVICE & OPERATIONS
unit.fullMarkdown:
# UNIT 4.5: BAR SERVICE & OPERATIONS

**Duration:** 4-6 hours (multiple shifts) | **Trainer:** Kayla

## Service Priority
1. Acknowledge everyone immediately (even if busy)
2. Seated bar guests first
3. Server tickets second
4. Communicate delays

## POS Functions
- Drink locations in system
- Modifiers (extra, no, neat, rocks)
- Comps vs. Voids
- Tab management (start, transfer, split, close)

## Working a Rush
1. Survey waiting orders
2. Batch similar drinks
3. Work efficiently (prep next while shaking)
4. Communicate delays proactively
5. Never stop moving

## Practice
- Open bar solo
- Work full shift with Kayla
- Close bar (reinforcement from Module 2)

---
